about_the_game:
Lovengrad is focused on a scary and immersive Survival experience. You are a Tourist in Bulgaria ( Eastern Europe ) where unfortunately you hit an animal on a long Drive during the night close to an old Village called Yunets.

From there you explore the Village which seems abandoned at the first glance and search for Carparts to repair your Car. But the Secret of the Village will be lifted up during the exploration.


BE AWARE!
The Werewolf is around, be prepared that he can ambush you anytime and anywhere!
Keep an eye on your Health, every Encounter with him can be your last. You just have this one Life.

DONT LET HIM IN!
Play the Kmethouse Level with different Difficulties and Survive the Night.

VR Physics
Full Locomotion (Physics based)
You can interact and collide with nearly everything
Use different Gadgets and Items to defend yourself
Scavenge Houses to search for helpful Tools or Weapons
Free roam Map
Use your surroundings to hide or distract the Werewolf
Saveoption


FREE UPCOMING UPDATES
This Year Lovengrad will get the following updates with the Unreal Engine 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

short_description: As a Tourist in an old eastern European village, you find yourself after a Car Accident trying to find a way to get out of the cursed Village.
